title: Comeback of Tehran-friendly Iraqi PM al-Maliki alarms US
summary_full: The return would deepen Iran’s sway in Iraq and erode the post-2003 state institutions built by the US and its allies
summary_public: The return would deepen Iran’s sway in Iraq and erode the post-2003 state institutions built by the US and its allies
